short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives flexible customization of the workflows menu. Gives the abilities: folders, rename workflows, group builds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extend Github Actions interface for follow abilities:
1) folders
2) custom names of workflows
3) group builds: ability to run multiple dispatch workflows from a single form
